攻击造成<@ba.kw>法术伤害</>.en: Blocks 3 enemies and attacks from long range, Enemies within Attack Range lose <$ba.invisible>Invisibility</>

Can use traps to assist in combat, but traps cannot be placed <@ba.kw>on tiles already occupied by an enemy</>;
Can be deployed on Melee tiles ,traps can be deployed on Ranged tiles
